website_summaries.verdict: A nice option for those wanting to add a bit of character or color to existing glassware.
pros: Comfortable grip with a weighted bottom and feet for added stability
With individual colors, there's no chance of drinks getting mixed up
Fun and unique design manages to be charmingly quirky without being juvenile
cons: A small set with only one size, so it doesn't offer much in terms of versatility

customer_reviews.title: so far, so good (now updated)
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I was looking for. I just needed an inexpensive way to designate a drinking glass (not plastic or metal) for each child. They arrived with no breakage. We've had them about a month and so far, so good, However, I do often wash them by hand because of other reviewers' complaints about the color coming off in the dishwasher. They look to me like the color is actually IN the base of the glass, not applied to the outside and subject to flaking off, but I'm just being cautious. UPDATE: We've now had these for nearly nine months and I've been washing them in the dishwasher with no problems. Very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Tru North

customer_reviews.title: Excellent glasses!
customer_reviews.text: Super cool glasses! They arrived on time, and packed with care. They look just like the picture. The colors are brilliant, and just what I wanted for my water and juice. I like the way the blue one makes my water look blue.🙂 Totally dishwasher safe because the color is in the glass. I'm very happy with them. 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: ACaliforniaSmile

customer_reviews.title: Attractive glasses, beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: We love the colorful "Vibrant Splash" beverage glasses! The assorted colors are very beautiful, and it makes it easy to avoid getting drinks mixed up when we have guests. The size is perfect, and the rounded shape is very comfortable in my hand. I appreciate that the colors are just at the bottom of the glass rather than coloring the entire glass and making some drinks look unattractive. I highly recommend these vibrant, colorful glasses.
customer_reviews.author: J. Zepf

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and fun to use
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are really neat if you enjoy color, particularly with water, as the glass color gets refracted into the liquid. The color is contained inside the glass and does not scrape off, but one of the glass's color got disturbed, scraped in the manufacturing process, so it appears to be scratched off partially, as seen in the photo. I cannot scrape it off any further, and there is no wear after multiple dishwashings. So, I can conclude that the color is permanently imbedded. So far, we have had no breakage, but the glass rims are thin enough to be a risk. The bases are heavy and comfortable to hold. I would recommend these glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Free Nibor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size to limit portions
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been trying to cut back on calories, especially in the amount of calories I am drinking. These fit exactly one cup, or serving size, of most drinks. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: paperbackvacation

customer_reviews.title: Size matters
customer_reviews.text: Pay attention to the measurements of this glass and pour that volume into a glass in your cabinet to understand the size of this one. Also, know that is poured to the very top of the glass and not what you would normally pour in order to use it easily without spillage.That is my best advice. In addition to these being smaller than what we normally use for a glass like this, there is something about the way the colored glass was made that does not look very appealing. It's not saturated throughout the bottom and I think that affects the overall appearance of the glass. Look fairly sturdy but overall, not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Useful and good looking
customer_reviews.text: the different colors are party perfect, and the glasses are a handy size. they seem very well made, and sparkled out of the dishwasher. I'll use them for the first time on Christmas day. If I'm not still loving them, I will repost here immediately. But I suspect I will love them, and am tempted to order more.
customer_reviews.author: Thinking

customer_reviews.title: and truly beautiful. The designs in the bottom of the glasses ...
customer_reviews.text: Affordable, and truly beautiful. The designs in the bottom of the glasses make the colors more dynamic and vibrant. They have a small, thin rim around the brim, and I find it pleasant to drink from them. I enjoyed them so much, that I also purchased the high ball 13 oz set, and the shot glass 2.75 oz set, as well! I'm very happy. I use my kitchen scrub brush to clean the two larger sets, as it fits into the openings; the shot glasses are easily scrubbed with a wash cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Rysing

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: The six glasses are smaller than normal glasses, as noted. They hold 8 oz., not 9.5. But they are pretty. The colors are aqua, purple, bright yellow, chartreuse yellow, orange, and red-rose.
customer_reviews.author: B. Zimmer

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: small size, easy to hold, just right for a light cocktail or glass of juice. the colors are really pretty on the bottom and I like that they are all a different color so when more than one is drinking, we know whose glass belongs to each other.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: FUN GLASSES
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these, and the larger size to help when company or family visit. They are comfortable to hold and drink from, with a weighted colored bottom that reflects it's color as if the entire glass had the tint. Very happy with purchase. Would make a great gift for someone raising a family.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Renee

customer_reviews.title: Pretty--mouth too small
customer_reviews.text: They are pretty and I love the colors..BUT the mouth of the glass is too narrow. Ice spills everywhere when I put it under my refrigerator ice dispenser. I got tired of wiping it up and finally discovered I can put a canning funnel in the top of my glass to catch the ice. .
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Bea

customer_reviews.title: Cute, color looks great, a little small.
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses. The only complaint is that they are smaller than the "average" highball drinking glass. The color does not fade, they are very cute, and I love them, but was disappointed by their size.
customer_reviews.author: Pooh Bear

customer_reviews.title: Lights up your water in different colors!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful glasses! When you pour water in them, the color of the bottom of the glass reflects in the water and it looks amazing! They’re a little smaller then I expected but cute for small amounts. Highly recommended!

customer_reviews.title: Even better in person
customer_reviews.text: Even better in person! I was worried about them arriving in one piece after some of the reviews but I ordered these and the taller version and all 12 arrived perfect! Nice weighted base and beautiful colors!

customer_reviews.title: making them perfect for bathroom or juice glasses
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a set of glasses that are well made and stylish, here they are. Note the amount of liquid they hold, making them perfect for bathroom or juice glasses.

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend it

The jewel like colors reflect back up into the glass and make them fun. The colors are on the inside of the glass, so they won't get washed off.

customer_reviews.title: they seem very sturdy. They wash well in the dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are just what I was looking for. They are very attractive. Although not heavy, they seem very sturdy. They wash well in the dishwasher. I certainly recommend them.

product_meta.title: Vibrant Splash Water/Beverage Glasses, 9.75 Ounce (6)
feature_bullets: Great everyday glasses for any beverage including water, soda, and juices
Colored bottoms make each glass easily identifiable for your guests
Made of high quality, durable glass. Weighted bottom enhances stability.
Makes a perfect gift to friends and family
